gobblin.hive

Class HiveSerDeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.hive.HiveSerDeManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HiveAvroSerDeManager

    @Alpha
public abstract class HiveSerDeManager
extends Object
    This class manages SerDe properties (including schema properties) for Hive registration.

    • Method Detail

      • addSerDeProperties

        public abstract void addSerDeProperties(Path path,
                                        HiveRegistrationUnit hiveUnit)
                                 throws IOException
        Add the appropriate SerDe properties (including schema properties) to the given HiveRegistrationUnit.
        Parameters:
        path - The Path from where the schema should be obtained.
        hiveUnit - The HiveRegistrationUnit where the serde properties should be added to.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • addSerDeProperties

        public abstract void addSerDeProperties(HiveRegistrationUnit source,
                                        HiveRegistrationUnit target)
                                 throws IOException
        Add the appropriate SerDe properties (including schema properties) to the target HiveRegistrationUnit using the SerDe properties from the source HiveRegistrationUnit.

        A benefit of doing this is to avoid obtaining the schema multiple times when creating a table and a partition with the same schema, or creating several tables and partitions with the same schema. After the first table/partition is created, one can use the same SerDe properties to create the other tables/partitions.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • updateSchema

        public abstract void updateSchema(HiveRegistrationUnit existingUnit,
                                  HiveRegistrationUnit newUnit)
                           throws IOException
        Update the schema in the existing HiveRegistrationUnit into the schema in the new HiveRegistrationUnit.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • haveSameSchema

        public abstract boolean haveSameSchema(HiveRegistrationUnit unit1,
                                       HiveRegistrationUnit unit2)
                                throws IOException
        Whether two HiveRegistrationUnit have the same schema.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • get

        public static HiveSerDeManager get(State props)
        Get an instance of HiveSerDeManager.
        Parameters:
        type - The HiveSerDeManager type. It should be either AVRO, or the name of a class that implements HiveSerDeManager. The specified HiveSerDeManager type must have a constructor that takes a State object.
        props - A State object. To get a specific implementation of HiveSerDeManager, specify either one of the values in HiveSerDeManager.Implementation (e.g., AVRO) or the name of a class that implements HiveSerDeManager in property HIVE_ROW_FORMAT. The State object is also used to instantiate the HiveSerDeManager.
